mapper.select:
select gift_no ,category_no ,gift_name ,gift_content ,gift_price ,count ,img_path as "img_path" ,img_1 as "img_1" ,img_2 as "img_2" ,img_3 as "img_3"
from gift g left outer join product_img p on g.gift_no=p.product_no

select GHIS_NO , GIFT_NO , USER_NO , BUYMETHOD_NO , PAYMENT_NO , CATEGORY_NO , to_char(h.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "h.CREATE_DATE" , PIECE , GIFT_NAME , GIFT_CONTENT , IMG_1 , IMG_PATH , GRIV_NO from gift_history h join gift using (GIFT_NO) left JOIN product_img ON (GIFT_NO = PRODUCT_NO) left join gift_review using (GHIS_NO) where user_no = #{userNo}
